attributes.action: Support the use of the Army to end the rioting and looting in London
attributes.additional_details:
We support the use of the armed forces in mainland Britain to end the ongoing criminality and violence.

We understand the precedent this sets, and while we would not accept the use of force to end legitimate protests, we do not believe that the current situation is anything more than wanton violence and thievery.

Once order has been restored the armed forces should be removed from the streets and the root causes of the rioting investigated and addressed so as to avoid a similar situation in the future.
